regen.absent_element: deletion of roles and management of application permissions
regen.new_specification: The administrator shall be able to delete existing application roles and manage application permissions for each role.

regen.absent_element: deletion of roles and permissions assignment to roles
regen.new_specification: The administrator shall be able to delete existing application roles and assign application permissions to roles.

regen.absent_element: deletion of roles and application permissions from roles
regen.new_specification: The administrator shall be able to delete existing application roles and remove users and application permissions from roles.

label: The administrator shall be able to assign application permissions to each user roles.
absence: action of assigning application permissions to user roles
